description:
Luffy`s group takes a deadly plunge into icy waters, and Trafalgar Law uses his unique abilities to rearrange Nami`s group and cast our heroes into chaotic confusion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Pinch: Luffy Gokkan no Mizuumi ni Shizumu
In a Real Pinch! Luffy Sinks into the Ice-cold Lake!
Péril en la demeure ! Luffy tombe dans le lac
Большие неприятности! Луффи тонет в Ледяном озере!
大ピンチ ルフィ極寒の湖に沈む
